content: tiny tot by knitionary www kristenrettig com sizes newborn baby toddler child dimensions 13 5 14 5 16 17 this is knit in garter stitch which is stretchy the hat will stretch to fit your tot s head cast on and off loosely gauge in garter stitch 22 sts by 44 row = 4 inches size us6 4mm needles or whatever you need to get gauge yarn dk weight about 100 yards more or less i used rowan softyak dk in plateau gray and savannah gold knit flat and seamed co 38 42 46 50 knit all row garter stitch for 9 10 11 12 cast off fold in half and sew side seams attach two 1 25 pompoms one to each corner knit in the round with circular needles co 74 80 88 94 knit garter stitch in the round *knit one round purl one round* repeat from *to* for 4 5 5 5 5 6 close top with 3 needle bind off and attach pompoms as above
